analysis.key_quote: Any effort to expand at-will employment for policy-influencing roles threatens to undermine this core merit-based system, opening the door to increased political influence, diminished career protections, and the erosion of institutional knowledge and independence.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, the erosion of merit-based systems, and the potential loss of institutional knowledge, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
